Name: August of August
About the game: August of August An alien spaceship crashes on a frozen planet,bringing the two similar planets together by common interests.Future disasters,friendships made,a tired and hot August...Can it all end well?Can the actions of different characters change the course of the story? Before the teenage dreams run dry: - Escape from the snowy fields of eternal night. - Searching for boring childish treasures in the sweaty summer. - Searching for clues to messy,disorganized dreams in the sleepy,sun-baked day. Esc:Menu Space or Enter:Survey Direction key control movement. Shift:Accelerate Alt+Enter:Full screen - Pixel 2D,RPG mini game screen. - Exquisite variety of maps with pixel action. - A relaxing atmosphere. - Easy gameplay,walking around,investigating clues and driving the story. - Not a single ending.
